response.overview: Huarong County was cursed by the Seven Orders of Gold. Governor Lu invited a Taoist priest to remove the evil spirits, but unexpectedly, Taoist priest Chen Pi and four of his disciples died strangely and tragically. This strange incident caused great panic in Huarong County. The mysterious Holy Spirit of the Rakshasa Sect incites the people in the county, triggering more tragic and bizarre cases to make more people believe in the Rakshasa Sect. At the critical moment, Governor Lu asks Chief Inspector Duan Guanglong to join hands with Xue Xiaofeng and Xue Xiaohua to secretly investigate the huge conspiracy behind the Seven Golden Orders and the Rakshasa Sect.
response.title: The Golden Book of Tricks
